column2: an A.M. Eatery////I had the Flight
column3: which is (3) pancakes of your choice. (Great news to those who are gluten intolerant
column4: because they have numerous gluten free options.) I had (1) blueberry pancake
column5: (1) pineapple pancake and (1) cinnamon pancake. I added (3) sausage links. I added the Pumkin flavoring to my coffee. Everything was very tasty.
